txt.en: Increases the range of Bastion of Light by 2m\n\nYour damaging skills have a +10% chance to copy your debuffs from one target onto up to 3 targets affected by Bastion of Light within 8m.
Increases the range of Bastion of Light by 4m\n\nYour damaging skills have a +20% chance to copy your debuffs from one target onto up to 3 targets affected by Bastion of Light within 10m.
Increases the range of Bastion of Light by 6m\n\nYour damaging skills have a +30% chance to copy your debuffs from one target onto up to 3 targets affected by Bastion of Light within 12m.
